title: Spectre Goggles
summaries: The Spectre Goggles are an accessory which allows the player to see Echo Blocks, Echo Platforms, Echo Walls, and tiles painted with Echo Coating while equipped. They are sold by the Cyborg for 10 when he is spoken to in a Graveyard.

statistics.Tooltip: Enables Echo Sight, showing hidden blocks
statistics.Buy: 10
statistics.Sell: 2
